text: Is there any way to retroactively add an `aria-label` to links within the `content.post_body` retroactively (and not by editing the article and modifying each link one by one)? The ideal outcome would be for links to have a label that is the same as what the link text is. But, I canâ€™t think of any way this is currently possible with Hubl, but it could be with javascript (just a little dangerous).
